Details.Name: sc_main_benefit
Details.Feature: 1% cashback on all local spend; 2% cashback on overseas and travel related spend.
Exclusive offers, discounts and privileges at over 1,000 established merchant outlets in Singapore, Malaysia and Indonasia.
Personal Concierge for your every need, anytime and anywhere.

Details.Name: sc_gift_details
Details.Feature: Limited edition ez-link card with S$40 stored value

Details.Name: sc_gift_cond
Details.Feature: 1. Successfully apply for 2 new principal CIMB Credit Cards (except CIMB Classic MasterCard) 2. Make a minimum of 3 transactions with either of the approved principal CIMB Credit Card within 1 month from the card approval date. 3. Application must be approved no later than 30 April 2016.

Details.Name: sc_other_fee
Details.Feature: Minimum Repayment: 3% of the outstanding balance or S$60.

Details.Name: sc_disclosure
Details.Feature: Accumulate S$2,000 in a statement month for 2% cashback on Overseas & Travel spend.
Additional 1% cashback will be credited and reflected in the following statement month after spend criteria has been met into the Principal Cardmember’s account and statement.
